definition: yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe
variant of 乾[qian2]
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
surname Qian
old variant of 乾[qian2]
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing earth/female principle/☷/ancient Chinese compass point: 225° (southwest)
variant of 坤[kun1]
lit. to upend heaven and earth (idiom)/fig. to change the course of events/to turn things around

sentences.english: A challenge is nothing but an opportunity turned upside down.
sentences.chinese: 挑战，无他，仅是一次扭转乾坤的机会。

sentences.english: But how easy will it be to get hold of their money?
sentences.chinese: 但是要将富豪的钱财乾坤大挪移过来，谈何容易？

sentences.english: No need to praise good color the fragrance spreads.
sentences.chinese: 不要人夸颜色好，只留香气满乾坤。

sentences.english: By employing the seemingly miraculous backhand painting technique, the art compacts the universe into a small space.
sentences.chinese: 它用神奇的内部反手画法将乾坤融于方寸之间。

sentences.english: Saw video of the cherry tree branches scattered on the silver is a little bit to play up the course of events.
sentences.chinese: 那樱树枝上翻出的零星的银光正在点点地渲染着乾坤。

sentences.english: If acres of a vaccine, the child in the parents universe, the world will be the only solution.
sentences.chinese: 若是千亩一苗，孩子在父母的乾坤里，便独步天下了。

sentences.english: Qiankun nickname is a ceremony, build homes of the world, that is nowhere to send me The Jen.
sentences.chinese: 乾坤浑是一个礼，盖舍了天下，即无处寄我之仁。

sentences.english: Steel spokes as the ridge and big bar as the girder that support the unswerving aspiration.
sentences.chinese: 钢丝为脊，大杠为梁，支撑着笑傲乾坤的张扬。

sentences.english: Just this little twist can make all the difference.
sentences.chinese: 其实小小的转变就可以扭转乾坤。

sentences.english: He thinks that he can beat me at tennis, but I have an ace up my sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 他以为他打网球能赢我，岂不知我还有袖里乾坤。

sentences.english: Chelsea and West Ham in swop deal ?
sentences.chinese: 切尔西与西汉姆联乾坤大挪移？

sentences.english: Single Menzi curious universal bag only appears things for one time.
sentences.chinese: 单门子万用乾坤袋只出一次东西。

sentences.english: Cold silent night thinking, look for jade Qiankun Tianming.
sentences.chinese: 寒风一夜思无语，天明争看玉乾坤。

definition: the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
mountains and rivers/the whole country
heaven and earth/world/scope/field of activity
Taixu (famed Buddhist monk, 1890-1947)
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
heaven and earth/yin and yang
yin and yang

four divisions (of the twenty-eight constellations 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4] of the sky into groups of seven mansions), namely: Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2], White Tiger 白虎[Bai2 hu3], Vermilion Bird 朱雀[Zhu1 que4], Black Tortoise 玄武[Xuan2 wu3]
the whole earth/the universe
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
good luck/Nature (as the mother of all things)
the Absolute or Supreme Ultimate, the source of all things according to some interpretations of Chinese mythology
diagram of cosmological scheme/Yin-Yang symbol ☯
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
paradise/heavenly or beautiful place/fairyland
first line of the Thousand Character Classic 千字文[Qian1 zi4 wen2]
five phases of Chinese philosophy: wood 木, fire 火, earth 土, metal 金, water 水
